product_summary:
FormWise.AI is a platform that allows users to create white-label AI tools. With FormWise.AI, users can build customGPTs, chat tools, and single-use tools. FormWise.AI provides a variety of features, including:

- 100% customizable, no-code builder
- White labeling features
- Bring your own API key & rebilling
- Theme builder + CSS
- Integrates with Stripe for reselling
- Embedding + iFrame anywhere
- Add data (PDFs, CSVs, URLs)
- Native GHL integration + webhooks
- FB Group + weekly live training
product_cons: Not all features are available on all plans
Some users have reported issues with customer support
Can be difficult to learn how to use

product_usecases.details: FormWise.AI allows users to create custom GPTs that can be used for a variety of purposes, such as generating text, translating languages, and answering questions.
FormWise.AI provides a variety of white-labeling features that allow users to create AI tools that can be branded with their own logo and colors.
FormWise.AI can be used to create lead magnets, such as ebooks, whitepapers, and webinars, that can be used to capture leads and grow your email list.
FormWise.AI can be used to automate tasks, such as answering customer questions, scheduling appointments, and generating reports.
FormWise.AI can be used to enhance customer service by providing customers with quick and easy access to information and support.

product_toolfor.details: FormWise.AI can help agencies create white-label AI tools that can be used to provide value to their clients.
FormWise.AI can help coaches create custom GPTs and other AI tools to use with their clients.
FormWise.AI can help marketers create lead magnets, automate tasks, and enhance customer service using AI.
FormWise.AI is easy to use, even for non-technical users.
FormWise.AI provides a variety of APIs and other tools that can be used by developers to create custom AI solutions.
